Question: In the divisional round of the playoffs, this person and the Colts lost to the Chargers, 28–24.
Hints: In a 35–3 victory against the Cincinnati Bengals, this person threw 3 TD passes while completing 26 of 32 passes for 277 yards.
At the end of the regular season this person was awarded his fourth MVP, breaking the NFL record for most MVPs by a single player.
This person passed for 194 yards and a touchdown in the loss.
